```{python pubs}
from publications import *
entries = parse_entries()
bibtable = []# ["| | | |", "|---|---|---|"]
idx = len(entries)
for entry in entries:
    #bibtable.append(f"| {idx}. | {entry.bib} | {entry.altmetric()} |")
    bibtable.append(f"{idx}. {entry.bib}\n")
    bibtable.append(f"{entry.altmetric(badge_type = 'donut')}\n")
    idx -= 1
```
